plot: William comes to Paris for a romantic Christmas weekend with his girlfriend, only to find that she has come to see her French lover.
title: Joyeux Noel
plot_es: William comes to Paris for a romantic Christmas weekend with his girlfriend, only to find that she has come to see her French lover.
plot_en: William comes to Paris for a romantic Christmas weekend with his girlfriend, only to find that she has come to see her French lover.
